member.summary: Determines whether the given request is an introspection request.

member.summary: Determines whether the given request is a token request.

member.name: M:AspNet.Security.OpenIdConnect.Primitives.OpenIdConnectExtensions.IsUserinfoRequest(AspNet.Security.OpenIdConnect.Primitives.OpenIdConnectRequest)
member.summary: Determines whether the given request is a userinfo request.
member.returns: true if the request is a userinfo request, false otherwise.

member.name: M:AspNet.Security.OpenIdConnect.Primitives.OpenIdConnectExtensions.IsNoneFlow(AspNet.Security.OpenIdConnect.Primitives.OpenIdConnectRequest)
member.summary: Determines whether the "response_type" parameter corresponds to the "none" response type. See http://openid.net/specs/oauth-v2-multiple-response-types-1_0.html#none for more information.
member.returns: true if the request is a response_type=none request, false otherwise.

member.name: M:AspNet.Security.OpenIdConnect.Primitives.OpenIdConnectExtensions.IsAuthorizationCodeFlow(AspNet.Security.OpenIdConnect.Primitives.OpenIdConnectRequest)
member.summary: Determines whether the "response_type" parameter corresponds to the authorization code flow. See http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc6749#section-4.1.1 for more information.
member.returns: true if the request is a code flow request, false otherwise.

member.name: M:AspNet.Security.OpenIdConnect.Primitives.OpenIdConnectExtensions.IsImplicitFlow(AspNet.Security.OpenIdConnect.Primitives.OpenIdConnectRequest)
member.summary: Determines whether the "response_type" parameter corresponds to the implicit flow. See http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc6749#section-4.2.1 and http://openid.net/specs/openid-connect-core-1_0.html for more information
member.returns: true if the request is an implicit flow request, false otherwise.

member.name: M:AspNet.Security.OpenIdConnect.Primitives.OpenIdConnectExtensions.IsHybridFlow(AspNet.Security.OpenIdConnect.Primitives.OpenIdConnectRequest)
member.summary: Determines whether the "response_type" parameter corresponds to the hybrid flow. See http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc6749#section-4.2.1 and http://openid.net/specs/openid-connect-core-1_0.html for more information.
member.returns: true if the request is an hybrid flow request, false otherwise.

member.name: M:AspNet.Security.OpenIdConnect.Primitives.OpenIdConnectExtensions.IsFragmentResponseMode(AspNet.Security.OpenIdConnect.Primitives.OpenIdConnectRequest)
member.summary: Determines whether the "response_mode" parameter corresponds to the fragment response mode. See http://openid.net/specs/oauth-v2-multiple-response-types-1_0.html for more information.
member.returns: true if the request specified the fragment response mode or if it's the default value for the requested flow, false otherwise.

member.name: M:AspNet.Security.OpenIdConnect.Primitives.OpenIdConnectExtensions.IsQueryResponseMode(AspNet.Security.OpenIdConnect.Primitives.OpenIdConnectRequest)
member.summary: Determines whether the "response_mode" parameter corresponds to the query response mode. See http://openid.net/specs/oauth-v2-multiple-response-types-1_0.html for more information.
member.returns: true if the request specified the query response mode or if it's the default value for the requested flow, false otherwise.

member.name: M:AspNet.Security.OpenIdConnect.Primitives.OpenIdConnectExtensions.IsFormPostResponseMode(AspNet.Security.OpenIdConnect.Primitives.OpenIdConnectRequest)
member.summary: Determines whether the "response_mode" parameter corresponds to the form post response mode. See http://openid.net/specs/oauth-v2-form-post-response-mode-1_0.html for more information.
member.returns: true if the request specified the form post response mode or if it's the default value for the requested flow, false otherwise.

member.name: M:AspNet.Security.OpenIdConnect.Primitives.OpenIdConnectExtensions.IsAuthorizationCodeGrantType(AspNet.Security.OpenIdConnect.Primitives.OpenIdConnectRequest)
member.summary: Determines whether the "grant_type" parameter corresponds to the authorization code grant. See http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc6749#section-4.1.3 for more information.
member.returns: true if the request is a code grant request, false otherwise.

member.name: M:AspNet.Security.OpenIdConnect.Primitives.OpenIdConnectExtensions.IsClientCredentialsGrantType(AspNet.Security.OpenIdConnect.Primitives.OpenIdConnectRequest)
member.summary: Determines whether the "grant_type" parameter corresponds to the client credentials grant. See http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc6749#section-4.4.2 for more information.
member.returns: true if the request is a client credentials grant request, false otherwise.

member.name: M:AspNet.Security.OpenIdConnect.Primitives.OpenIdConnectExtensions.IsPasswordGrantType(AspNet.Security.OpenIdConnect.Primitives.OpenIdConnectRequest)
member.summary: Determines whether the "grant_type" parameter corresponds to the password grant. See http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc6749#section-4.3.2 for more information.
member.returns: true if the request is a password grant request, false otherwise.

member.name: M:AspNet.Security.OpenIdConnect.Primitives.OpenIdConnectExtensions.IsRefreshTokenGrantType(AspNet.Security.OpenIdConnect.Primitives.OpenIdConnectRequest)
member.summary: Determines whether the "grant_type" parameter corresponds to the refresh token grant. See http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc6749#section-6 for more information.
member.returns: true if the request is a refresh token grant request, false otherwise.
